product_overview: Yardım Yönetim Paneli is a comprehensive web application designed for NGOs to efficiently manage needy individuals, donations, volunteers, applications, and financial processes on a unified platform. It enhances operational efficiency, data accuracy, and transparency through secure role-based access and detailed reporting.
core_goals: Centralize management of needy individuals, donations, applications, finance, and volunteers within a single dashboard.
Accelerate data entry and reduce user errors through validated forms and streamlined workflows.
Increase process visibility via reporting, status tracking, and audit logs.
Ensure secure access using role-based access control (RBAC) and maintain audit trails for all critical operations.
Support scalability to at least 500 concurrent users and maintain response times under 2 seconds on critical screens.
key_features: User authentication and authorization with Supabase, including role-based access control.
Dashboard home displays key statistics and overview cards for quick insights.
Needy management module with full CRUD, detailed views including bank accounts, photos, and documents.
Donation management supporting cash and sacrifice donations with tracking and detailed records.
Finance management including bank and cash account management, transaction tracking, and reporting.
Event management system with event creation and calendar integration.
Volunteer registry with mission assignments and detailed profile management.
Application management for aid process workflow with status tracking.
Orphan management and sponsorship tracking features.
Aid distribution modules covering cash, service, transfer, logistics, and cashdesk aids.
Purchase management for orders and merchant tracking.
Messaging and notification system supporting SMS and bulk messaging.
Reporting module with analytics and export to Excel/PDF.
User settings and management including definitions and account configuration.
Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and styled with Tailwind CSS for consistency and accessibility.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via the authentication system with role-based permissions governing access.
From the dashboard home, user selects a module to manage needy individuals, donations, volunteers, etc.
In needy management, user can add, edit, view detailed records including tabs for bank accounts and document uploads.
Donation workflows allow creation and tracking of different donation types with donor details and receipt generation.
Finance users manage bank and cash accounts, record transactions, and generate financial reports.
Volunteers can be registered, assigned to missions, and monitored through the volunteer management module.
Aid applications are created, their progression monitored, and status updates managed through the applications module.
Notifications and bulk messages can be sent to stakeholders via the messaging system.
Reports are generated and exported for operational and financial analysis.
Users manage their account settings and system configurations including role definitions and user permissions.
validation_criteria: At least 95% successful processing rate in core business workflows such as needy registration, donations, applications, finance, and volunteer management.
Active usage in at least five primary modules including needy management, donations, applications, finance, and volunteers.
Monthly report generation time is reduced by at least 50% compared to the previous system.
System response time under 2 seconds for critical user interactions and pages.
Proper implementation of role-based access control with no unauthorized access to restricted modules.
Audit logs capturing key user actions with traceability for security and compliance purposes.
Successful integration with Supabase services for authentication, database, and storage.
Accurate and validated data entry with form validation using Zod schemas.
Accessibility compliance including keyboard navigation support on forms and tables.
Scalability tested to support at least 500 concurrent users without degradation.
